game.name: Dark Jungle
game.shortDescription: 어두운 정글은 적대적 생물과 고대 유물의 전체 위험한 숲을 탐험 마법사 도리안으로 재생하는 2 차원 판타지 모험이다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dark Jungle is a 2d fantasy adventure where you play as the great magician Dorian and find yourself in a fairytale forest.

reviewHighlights.text: the game is about nothing, the colors are so bright that it is impossible to play it, you run like a radioactive field.
Honestly? 25€ for this? i wouldnt even download it if it was free. Theres no objective, no tutorial, i randomly just die. I wont even mention the look...
